description:
The job title is SDE Intern, and the description is as follows: 

Project Description: Seeking a remote MERN Stack Developer Intern to join our team and assist in designing and developing high-quality web/mobile applications. Responsibilities include maintaining and improving code, ensuring scalability, and suggesting new features for product enhancement.  Skills used includes MongoDB, ReactJS, JavaScript, Web Development, NodeJS.. The skills required for the job are MongoDB, ReactJS, JavaScript, Web Development, NodeJS.
